exercises.common_mistake: Pressing forward instead of up or excessive back arch

exercises.scientific_explanation: This exercise provides training stimulus for pull vertical development with evidence-based applications.
exercises.form_cue: Pull chest to bar, control descent, full range of motion
exercises.common_mistake: Partial range of motion or using excessive momentum

exercises.scientific_explanation: This exercise provides training stimulus for mobility development with evidence-based applications.
exercises.form_cue: Move slowly and controlled, feel stretch, breathe deeply
exercises.common_mistake: Forcing the stretch or moving through compensation patterns

exercises.scientific_explanation: This exercise provides training stimulus for plyometric development with evidence-based applications.
exercises.form_cue: Land softly, minimize ground contact, explode up immediately
exercises.common_mistake: Landing stiff or taking too much time on ground contact

exercises.scientific_explanation: This exercise provides training stimulus for cardio development with evidence-based applications.
exercises.form_cue: Focus on proper form and controlled movement
exercises.common_mistake: Poor form execution or inadequate range of motion

exercises.scientific_explanation: This exercise provides training stimulus for pull horizontal development with evidence-based applications.
exercises.form_cue: Retract shoulder blades, pull elbows back, squeeze at end
exercises.common_mistake: Using momentum or not retracting shoulder blades

exercises.scientific_explanation: This exercise provides training stimulus for push horizontal development with evidence-based applications.
exercises.form_cue: Retract shoulder blades, control descent, drive up powerfully
exercises.common_mistake: Flaring elbows excessively or bouncing off chest
